title: Levitating
author: Dua Lipa
lyrics:
[00:04.55] If you wanna run away with me, I know a galaxy
[00:08.06] And I can take you for a ride
[00:09.16] I had a premonition that we fell into a rhythm
[00:11.24] Where the music don't stop for life
[00:13.71] Glitter in the sky, glitter in my eyes
[00:15.77] Shining just the way I like
[00:18.52] If you're feeling like you need a little bit of company
[00:20.18] You met me at the perfect time
[00:22.54] You want me, I want you, baby
[00:24.98] My sugarboo, I'm levitating
[00:27.21] The Milky Way, we're renegading
[00:29.55] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[00:31.82] I got you, moonlight, you're my starlight
[00:35.72] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[00:38.47] I'm levitating
[00:42.06] You, moonlight, you're my starlight (you're the moonlight)
[00:46.45] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[00:49.92] I'm levitating
[00:51.58] I believe that you're for me, I feel it in our energy
[01:03.02] I see us written in the stars
[01:03.79] We can go wherever, so let's do it now or never, baby
[01:13.34] Nothing's ever, ever too far
[01:23.23] Glitter in the sky, glitter in our eyes
[01:24.57] Shining just the way we are
[01:26.09] I feel like we're forever, every time we get together
[01:26.71] But whatever, let's get lost on Mars
[01:27.41] You want me, I want you, baby
[01:28.42] My sugarboo, I'm levitating
[01:33.23] The Milky Way, we're renegading
[01:35.71] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[01:37.80] I got you, moonlight, you're my starlight
[01:41.87] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[01:46.16] I'm levitating
[01:49.04] You, moonlight, you're my starlight (you're the moonlight)
[01:51.31] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[01:55.27] I'm levitating (whoo)
[01:56.61] You can fly away with me tonight
[01:59.23] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:01.54] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[02:04.04] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:05.41] I'm levitating (whoo)
[02:06.55] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:08.48] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:10.24] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[02:12.56] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (whoo)
[02:14.76] My love is like a rocket, watch it blast off
[02:16.70] And I'm feeling so electric, dance my arse off
[02:18.83] And even if I wanted to, I can't stop
[02:21.16] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:24.17] My love is like a rocket, watch it blast off
[02:25.95] And I'm feeling so electric, dance my arse off
[02:28.26] And even if I wanted to, I can't stop
[02:30.80] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:34.17] You want me, I want you, baby
[02:36.34] My sugarboo, I'm levitating
[02:37.81] The Milky Way, we're renegading
[02:42.38] I got you (yeah), moonlight, you're my starlight
[02:47.65] I need you all night (all night), come on, dance with me
[02:50.63] I'm levitating (whoo)
[02:53.31] You can fly away with me tonight (tonight)
[02:55.25] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:57.01] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[02:59.37] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (take you for a ride)
[03:01.51] I'm levitating (whoo)
[03:02.57] You can fly away with me tonight (tonight)
[03:04.19] You can fly away with me tonight
[03:05.39] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[03:09.07] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (let me take you for a ride)
[03:10.50] I got you, moonlight, you're my starlight (you are my starlight)
[03:12.73] I need you all night, come on, dance with me (come on, dance with me, baby)
[03:18.91] I'm levitating
[03:27.82] You, moonlight, you're my starlight (you're the moonlight)
[03:29.39] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[03:32.40] I'm levitating
[03:34.06]
